title: In case where LOI/IOA was issued by CEO (SRA) prior to sanction of DP 2034 in respect of plot affected by reservations as per SRDP 1991, then those reservations shall remain in force as per DCR 1991 even after the sanction of DP 2034 and shall be developed as per DCR 1991
clause_text: In case where LOI/IOA was issued by CEO (SRA) prior to sanction of DP 2034 in respect of plot affected by reservations as per SRDP 1991, then those reservations shall remain in force as per DCR 1991 even after the sanction of DP 2034 and shall be developed as per DCR 1991.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
